definition: to feel attached to/to long for/to love

sentences.english: There is no hiding from lovers eyes.
sentences.chinese: 什么也瞒不过恋人的眼睛。

sentences.english: The lovers were making sheep's eyes at each other over the table.
sentences.chinese: 那对恋人隔著桌子互送秋波。

sentences.english: Softly press to wear make-up, as the closest comfort from the lover.
sentences.chinese: 以轻压方式上妆，仿佛恋人最亲密的爱抚。

sentences.english: Sometimes, the love between lovers will not separate die, but will become deeper.
sentences.chinese: 有时，恋人间的分离不会令爱磨灭，反而会变得更深。

sentences.english: Make a custom certificate for your lover.
sentences.chinese: 为恋人制作一张普通的证书。

sentences.english: So, she used her magic and kept the villagers out of the forest; the two love birds were hence well protected.
sentences.chinese: 于是，施法将村民们赶出了森林，保护了这对恋人。

sentences.english: And the maker of the 'lovers' sculpture was one of these people.
sentences.chinese: 这件恋人雕塑的制造者，就是这些人类中的一员。

sentences.english: Song Errui of wife of Yao far newly-married is Jin Rui in former days lover.
sentences.chinese: 姚远新婚妻子宋而瑞是金锐的昔日恋人。

sentences.english: His partner, reportedly hounded by the police, attempted self-immolation.
sentences.chinese: 他的恋人，据说因受到警方的骚扰，曾企图自焚。

sentences.english: Treat your honey to a romantic dinner by candle-light.
sentences.chinese: 邀请恋人共进烛光晚餐。

sentences.english: The road and I are lovers.
Slow-dance at a restaurant -- when there's no music playing.
sentences.chinese: 在餐馆中，没有音乐伴奏下，和你的恋人跳慢舞。

sentences.english: Stars into the studies abroad, and Ming Li reunion, the two became lovers.
sentences.chinese: 星进学成归国，与明莉重逢，两人成了恋人。

sentences.english: Channel your energy into passionate interludes with your lover.
sentences.chinese: 把精力用在和恋人的激情嬉戏上。

sentences.english: Land and water are gradually approaching each other like two 36)bashful lovers.
sentences.chinese: 大地和水像是害羞的恋人们一般一天比一天靠近彼此。

sentences.english: There is not hiding from lover's eyes.
sentences.chinese: 什么也瞒不过恋人的眼睛。

definition: emotion/sentiment/affection/feelings between two persons/CL:個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]
to fall head over heels in love/to be passionately in love
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
